subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Marlins seem poised to send third baseman Miguel Cabrera and pitcher Dontrelle Willis to the Tigers for center fielder Cameron Maybin, pitcher Andrew Miller and four other players.
snippet: The Marlins seem poised to send third baseman Miguel Cabrera and pitcher Dontrelle Willis to the Tigers for center fielder Cameron Maybin, pitcher Andrew Miller and four other players.
